cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0.0)
project(learn_cmake VERSION 0.1.0 LANGUAGES CXX)

#set c++ standard while compiling
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 14) # -std=c++14 type->1
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -std=c++17") #type ->2


set(EXECUTABLE_OUTPUT_PATH "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin")
set(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH  "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib")


add_executable(${PROJECT_NAME} main.cpp)
add_subdirectory(cpp_modules)
# add_subdirectory(include)
target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE ImGui-SFML::ImGui-SFML sfml-graphics sfml-window sfml-system)
target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE opengl32)
include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/libraries/include)
set(CPACK_PROJECT_NAME ${PROJECT_NAME})
set(CPACK_PROJECT_VERSION ${PROJECT_VERSION})
